thread.section_title: HomeAdvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HomeAdvisor | www.homeadvisor.com | 14 of 404
thread.title: Carey

author: Carey
title: Carey
text:
Went online to look at who might be able to do a job for me early one Saturday morning. Wasn't sure I was really ready to do the job, just looking for could someone do the work I needed. Within an hour, started getting calls from people looking to Quote: /perform my work. Did not expect such a fast response, especially on a weekend! The contractors I spoke with were all friendly and eager to get to work. Ended up with a contract that afternoon. Work done on Tuesday. Very good experience.
Word of advice: Maybe be more certain than I was about actually having the work done before putting yourself out there. Make sure you note whether you are just planning, or actually ready to do work!
